data.text: I am very miserable/frustrated!
All the godly people have disappeared from this land;
They all use both hands to do what is evil.
Even the best people are as worthless [SIM] as briers;
So, do not trust anyone!
Boys will despise their fathers,
As for me, I wait for Yahweh to help me.
You who are our enemies,
We must be patient while Yahweh punishes us
Our enemies will also see that, and they will be disgraced
You people of Israel, at that time your cities will be rebuilt,
People from many countries will come to honor you:
But the other countries on the earth will become desolate
Yahweh, protect your people like [MET] a shepherd protects his sheep by using his walking stick;
Yahweh says/replies,
People from many nations will see what Yahweh does for you,
Being very humiliated, they will crawl on the ground [MTY] like [SIM] snakes.
Yahweh, there is no [RHQ] God like you;
You will again act kindly/compassionately toward us.
You will show that you faithfully do what you promised for us and faithfully love us,
